Total auditors’ remuneration | 4,162 | 3,769

paragraph 1: This section presents the total remuneration of the Group’s external auditors for audit, assurance, and other services.
paragraph 2: The auditors’ remuneration for the Group is as follows:
paragraph 3: (1) Assurance related services include various agreed upon procedures and review of the sustainability report.
paragraph 4: (2)  Other non-audit services include financial due diligence and other sundry services.
paragraph 5: (3)  Other auditors are international associates of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Australia.
